my_new_tasks: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.IterationPath], [KL.AnalysisExpectedDate] FROM workitems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.Reason] = 'New' AND [System.State] = 'Proposed' AND [System.AssignedTo] = @me) ORDER BY [KL.AnalysisExpectedDate] ASC, [System.Id] DESC
my_overdue_tasks: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.IterationPath], [KL.RND.ExpectedDevResolveDate] FROM workitems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Task' AND [System.State] != 'Closed' AND [KL.RND.ExpectedDevResolveDate] != '' AND [KL.RND.ExpectedDevResolveDate] < @Today AND [System.AssignedTo] = @me) ORDER BY [KL.RND.ExpectedDevResolveDate] ASC, [System.Id] DESC
my_active_bugs: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] FROM workitems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Bug' AND NOT [System.State] CONTAINS 'Closed' AND [System.AssignedTo] = @me AND [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] < 3) ORDER BY [Microsoft.VSTS.Common.Priority] ASC
my_new_crs: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.IterationPath], [KL.EstimationExpectedDate], [KL.EstimationReadyDate] FROM workitems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Change Request' AND [System.State] = 'Proposed' AND [KL.Stage] = 'Waiting Estimation' AND [System.AssignedTo] = @me) ORDER BY [KL.EstimationExpectedDate] ASC, [System.Id] DESC
my_overdue_crs: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.IterationPath], [KL.EstimationExpectedDate], [KL.EstimationReadyDate] FROM workitems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Change Request' AND [System.State] != 'Closed' AND [KL.EstimationReadyDate] != '' AND [KL.EstimationReadyDate] < @Today AND [System.AssignedTo] = @me) ORDER BY [KL.EstimationReadyDate] ASC, [System.Id] DESC
my_new_brqs: SELECT [System.Id], [System.Title], [System.IterationPath], [KL.PrioIndexDouble] FROM workitems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project AND ([System.WorkItemType] = 'Requirement' AND [System.State] = 'Proposed' AND [KL.Stage] = 'Waiting Analysis' AND [System.AssignedTo] = @me) ORDER BY [KL.PrioIndexDouble] ASC, [System.Id] DESC
